constituent: bystander, person, traffic cop, fez, vase, stand up, crown, compass, direction
koohiiStory1: In Japan, the emperor is a bystander - he stands on his crown but can´t really affect the direction of the country. (thx shimouma).
koohiiStory2: Mr. T is in the street, standing up, wearing an golden crown and a compass in his hand... he´s asking the bystander if they know how to get to buckingham palace (!).
kunYomi: かたわ.ら、わき、おか-、はた、そば
words: 傍ら(かたわら): beside(s), while, nearby
